alert.note: Alert for Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:52PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Pima and southwestern Santa Cruz Counties through 215 PM MST... At 151 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Arivaca, or 14 miles southwest of Tubac, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arivaca, Arivaca Lake, Ruby and Pena Blanca Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
